Working hard is something I like doing very much.
While working I set for myself very high standards
Other people think I don’t work very hard.
It is mainly a matter of fate whether or not I am having few friends or many friends.
When I get what I want, it is usually because I worked hard for it.
It is foolish to plan for the future as many times it is the fate that decides the way things happen
Most leaders have reached their positions because they were lucky enough to be in the right place at the right time.
When my way of running the business is not successful, I experiment with different ways of running the business.
I closely monitor the areas of my capability where I need more practice.
I set goals to become successful in business
I figure out which things I do not understand well and adjust my strategies accordingly.
I seek an active role of leadership in the groups that I am part of.
When working in a group, I prefer being “in command” rather than being a follower.
I accomplish a lot at work because I love my job.
I look forward to returning to work when I am away from my work.
My work gives me maximum joy and satisfaction
It is usually easy for me to stick to my aims and accomplish my goals.
I am confident that I could deal efficiently with unexpected events.
I can remain calm when facing difficulties because I can rely on my coping abilities.
When confronted with a problem, I can usually find several solutions.
